title: Is it plan to get map completion info ?

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: Completed hero points are available from /v2/characters/name/heropoints with the progression scope. For the rest of the bits, there’s an open issue that I haven’t had time to implement yet.

comments.author: Dorazur.9420
comments.body:
Is it plan to get map completion info through v2/characters/ ?

Including for each map:
– the number of completed Renown Hearts
– the number of discovered Way Points
– the number of Hero Points done
– the number of discovered Vista
